name: HCL AppScan Enterprise (ASE)
description: Allows UrbanCode Velocity to import AppScan scan results as metrics.

notes: Bug Fix: In earlier version of plugin data into HCL AppScan Enterprise Issues metrics was not showing in VSM.

Removed Manual User Access Key: From current version onwards this plugin will only support Auto Generated User Access Key feature of HCL Accelerate.

Initial Sync Date Field Added: Under the hidden properties section of add integration page for the HCL Appscan Enterprise plugin an Initial Sync Date field is added. This field is optional and can be used only for the first sync.

Added WorkflowId: Under the hidden properties section of add integration page for HCL Appscan Enterprise plugin a Workflow ID field is added. This field is optional and can be used to provide HCL Accelerate WorkflowId - the ID of a Value Stream (VSM )to which HCL Appscan Enterprise vulnerability data is associated.
Preventing Installation on Older Versions: This version of HCL Appscan Enterprise Plugin can only be installed on HCL Accelerate version 3.0.0 and later

Added build URL to link scan results with VSM
Data gets mapped under right category - Risk
Configure logger in wrapper and fix broken plugin.

name: Github
description: Allows UrbanCode Velocity to sync Github resources.

notes: Changes in the Github plugin to handle draft PR and use the new field in the DB. Have added top-level field for draft on pull requests in our GraphQL schema
Fix Pull Request sync with the newest versions of the GitHub Api.

Enhancement: This enhancement modifies the plugins synchronization behavior following a failure. Previously, the plugin would resume syncing from the date of the last successful synchronization. Now, it has been updated to continue syncing commits, pull-requests, and issues from the point where it last synced before the failure. This change ensures more accurate and efficient data synchronization by reducing the likelihood of missing or duplicating data in cases where the plugin had partially synced before encountering an issue.
Wild Card feature for additional branches field in GitHub Plugin
Feature: Syncing Yaml files from different repositories
Bug fix: Previous version was failing for upload commit of large size.
Removed Manual User Access Key: From current version onwards this plugin will only support Auto Generated User Access Key feature of HCL Accelerate.
Meta data plugin updates for VSM onboarding:In index.js file added categories and added idRegExp fields
New feature added - Query for CI processes using GitHub Actions in a repository
Primary and secondary API rate limit fix
Bug fix: UAK support for older versions
Auto-generated User Access Key support added
Added support to pull commits from multiple additional branches
Pull commit data from non master branch
Added ability to retrieve multiple repositories
Fix bug around empty commit hash.
Upgrade to use the latest version of api-client.
Fixed pagination bug with pull requests and commits.

Resolved 502 Bad Gateway Error: Previous version of plugin was giving a 502 Bad Gateway error for GitLab Server.

Resolved Previous Version Issue: Previous Version of plugin had some defect realted to Project Names field. The plugin was syncing data only for those projects which were owned by the user. Now the plugin syncs data for the projects in which user is a member at any level.
Added Category: ALM | SCM | Build | Deploy are the categories of GitLab plugin.
Adding project names instead of project IDs while integration
other Branches field added with datasince filed removed and historicaldata in vsm fixed
Added history to Issues and PR
Pulls commit from non-master & included issues

Personal Access Token Support: The Jira Plugin was unable to use Personal Access Tokens for authentication in previous versions for Jira Server. However, a new field called Personal Access Token has been introduced to enable authentication using this feature.

name: ServiceNow
description: Allows UrbanCode Velocity to sync change requests and incident from ServiceNow.

notes: We have added a new field for Resource Types and Sys_params, which will synchronize events based on the provided sys_params.
When the feature flag is enabled, all data collection queries will read from the read replica instance.

Bug fix: Removed drop down feature in update change request and change task and wait changes automation task which was implemented to select change request number as it was uploading more data to integration details. Now user can enter change request number manually.

Bug fix: Enabled to create standard and emergency change request in create change request and change task automation task by changing api request made to create.( earlier it was creating only normal change )
Add initial sync: Under the hidden properties section of add integration page for the plugin an Initial Sync Date field is added. This field is optional and can be used only for the first sync.
Resync functionality: After integration plugin provides an option to perform either full resync or resync from selected date so that plugin resync again.

Output Property field added: For automation task create change request and change task output property field is added which stores system id of change request when created and for change task output property is provided inside object under create change task field.
Wait change task: A new automation task is created for waiting change task.
Minor bug fix: Earlier plugin was unable to resync when incident is resolved
Bug fix: The previous version was failing to upload issues of large size.
Minor enhancement: Previously, the number of issues per page was fixed, but now it is configurable. You can modify the number of issues per page to fetch.
Feature enhancement: In automation task enabled to create and update change task.
Bug fix: Fixed issue related to syncing of change and problem in servicenow schedule event.
Minor bug fix: Fixed bug related to proxy server change and related to automation task execution.
Manual UAK removal and preventing install on previous version

name: UbranCode Deploy
description: Sync applications, components, snapshots, environments, inventories, and application processes related data from UrbanCode Deploy server.

notes: Releasing again for prev version changes
Releasing again for prev version changes

In this version automation task execution mechanism got modified. Previously we used to do completion of task during sync event. Now during execution of automation task, completion of task happens. It is helpful for giving exact user to the devops velocity and makes the execution faster. Build Polling Timeout as a new parameter is added in the plugin which indicates Length of time (in minutes) to wait for build to complete if task is set to wait. User can customize the Build Polling Timeout as per the need. Along with that a property which is a wait property is added. During the addition of task, wait property is in true state by default. It indicates plugin will wait for build to complete. If it explicitly set to false, then plugin will not for build to complete.
In this version, no need to add automatedTaskRunner manually to ucd server. It will ease of work for schedule deployment and auto promotion by reducing manual intervention.
Minor bug fix: In previous version user who does not exist on UCD server were able to execute the task. Now User who exists on UCD Server and have sufficient permission is able to execute the task.
Rebranding: Name of the plugin is changed from UrbanCode Deploy to IBM DevOps Deploy.
Started uploading statuses to Snapshot and Component versions
Using version properties for mapping build.url parameter
Removed Version as mandatory for external UCD
Bug Fix: In previous version - plugin was not syncing more than 100 applications and it was resulting in Snapshot Upload failure.
Sync All Applications at First Sync: Now UCD plugin is syncing all the applications, environments, processes, and components data even if an initial sync date is given.
Deployment Plan Fix: In previous version of plugin deployment plan was not getting completed if we have parallel and sequential tasks with UCD app.
Removing Deleted Applications: In the previous version of plugin the deleted Application processes were also available while selecting the process in the pipeline.

Removed UrbanCode Deploy Status Task: Assign status task is removed and made part of main UrbanCode Deploy Task as post deployment success or failure step for assigning Snapshot or Component Version status.
Internal Server Error Fix: The urbancode deploy plugin was giving internal server error while syncing the application processes from the UCD server.
Corrected incorrectly spelled plugin name: In urbancode deploy plugin, display name was incorrectly spelled as Ubrancode deploy. Now corrected to Urbancode deploy.
